sentences: Alex Sipiagin (born June 11, 1967) is a Russian jazz trumpeter and flugelhorn player.
He moved from Russia to the U.S. in 1990.
He moved from Russia to the U.S. in 1990. His first major job in the U.S. was with the Gil Evans Band.
His album NoFo Skies was his first for Blue Room Music, but was recorded by the same quintet as his preceding Moments Captured.
The Latin Side of Joe Henderson (Half Note, 2014)
Robin Eubanks, More Than Meets the Ear (ArtistShare, 2015)
James Moody, Young at Heart (Warner Bros., 1996)
Luis Perdomo, Spirits and Warriors (Criss Cross, 2016)
Dafnis Prieto, Back to the Sunset (Dafnison Music, 2018)
